HediffDef.label: old wooden leg
HediffDef.description: Strongly dilapidated wooden leg.
HediffDef.labelNoun: an old wooden leg, probably found somewhere in the trash or taken from some tramp. As a prosthesis, there is almost no benefit, but it will allow you to lift someone to his feet.

HediffDef.label: power fist
HediffDef.description: Power fist with a metal shell. Connected to small batteries that accelerate it at the time of impact. A simple and painful tool to prove to someone who's the boss.
HediffDef.labelNoun: power fist

HediffDef.label: Obsolete hand substitute
HediffDef.description: The simplest device, the purpose of which is to maintain the health of the owner. Created by primitive technologies of the industrial age.
HediffDef.labelNoun: obsolete hand substitute

HediffDef.label: Old simple prosthetic arm
HediffDef.description: Extremely simple device with the functions of the human hand, but extremely outdated for our era.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Old simple prosthetic arm

HediffDef.label: Non combat prosthesis
HediffDef.description: This device was made to facilitate hand work, but unfortunately it is too fragile for combat.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Non combat prosthesis

HediffDef.label: Active mechanical forearms
HediffDef.description: It is a mechanical prosthesis, the main advantage of which is control over the compression force and the absence of a pain threshold.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Active mechanical forearms

HediffDef.label: Light traction forearms
HediffDef.description: Despite the new technologies, they still have disadvantages.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Light traction forearms

HediffDef.label: magnetic hand
HediffDef.description: Magnetic joints and forearms give combat effectiveness and speed.
HediffDef.labelNoun: magnetic hand

HediffDef.label: all-metal pirate battle claw
HediffDef.description: The lack of any tools for work is compensated by lethal force.
HediffDef.labelNoun: all-metal pirate battle claw

HediffDef.label: electromagnetic prosthesis
HediffDef.description: Electromagnetic force allows the prosthesis to maintain itself in a necessary condition.
HediffDef.labelNoun: electromagnetic prosthesis

HediffDef.label: bloodied pirate blade
HediffDef.description: Lack of difficulty in manufacturing makes it cheap, good in melee.
HediffDef.labelNoun: bloodied pirate blade

HediffDef.label: forearm with sensors
HediffDef.description: Low sensitivity brings both efficiency and combat unsuitability.
HediffDef.labelNoun: forearm with sensors

HediffDef.label: active hand with electric shocker
HediffDef.description: The ability to accumulate a small charge gives the prosthesis an advantage.
HediffDef.labelNoun: active hand with electric shocker

HediffDef.label: advanced mechanical arm
HediffDef.description: Received additional functions while improving its predecessor in exchange for excess weight.
HediffDef.labelNoun: advanced mechanical arm

HediffDef.label: advanced electromagnetic joints for the hand
HediffDef.description: This version of the prosthesis benefits from its design.
HediffDef.labelNoun: advanced electromagnetic joints for the hand

HediffDef.label: prosthesis with power weight
HediffDef.description: This device combines lethal force due to its severity with advanced small mathorics.
HediffDef.labelNoun: prosthesis with power weight

HediffDef.label: scientific hypersensitive prosthesis
HediffDef.description: Electron binding means allowed the creator to realize this device.
HediffDef.labelNoun: scientific hypersensitive prosthesis

HediffDef.label: energy-mounted hand
HediffDef.description: The use of constant voltage allows you to lighten the weight of the structure and increase combat power.
HediffDef.labelNoun: energy-mounted hand

HediffDef.label: fiber optic forearm
HediffDef.description: The use of fiber as a main component significantly reduces strength, giving priority to efficiency.
HediffDef.labelNoun: fiber optic forearm

HediffDef.label: biomechanical joints
HediffDef.description: With the advent of this technology, host movements become faster.
HediffDef.labelNoun: biomechanical joints

HediffDef.label: vanometer accelerator forearm
HediffDef.description: Despite some weighting, these prostheses are able to support themselves by independently generating a charge.
HediffDef.labelNoun: vanometer accelerator forearm

HediffDef.label: active sensor hand
HediffDef.description: Increasing sensitivity, researchers were able to obtain technologies close to archotech.
HediffDef.labelNoun: active sensor hand

HediffDef.label: bionic blades
HediffDef.description: Lightweight blades fit in place of the fingers, complicating work, but increasing damage.
HediffDef.labelNoun: bionic blades

HediffDef.label: titanium blades
HediffDef.description: Damage technology does not stand still, presenting you a compromise option of efficiency and power.
HediffDef.labelNoun: titanium blades

HediffDef.label: cyber hand mk1
HediffDef.description: Сyber prosthesis for mk1 suit, giving additional benefits.
HediffDef.labelNoun: cyber hand mk1

HediffDef.label: lightweight cybernetic forearm MK1
HediffDef.description: Сyber prosthesis for mk1 suit, giving additional benefits. Now even more perfect
HediffDef.labelNoun: lightweight cybernetic forearm MK1

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VI
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". A good and cheap replacement for eyes with impaired vision. Provides the ability to see up 8192 colors. Released 25 years ago, out of production.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". A good and cheap replacement for eyes with impaired vision. Provides the ability to see up to 8192 colors. Released 25 years ago, out of production.

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VII
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". Better efficiency, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". Better efficiency, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VII: Combat Edition
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the military. Better efficiency, improves shooting accuracy, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the military. Better efficiency, improves shooting accuracy, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VII: Medical Edition
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the healthcare companies. Better efficiency, improves the quality of medical operations, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the healthcare companies. Better efficiency, improves the quality of medical operations, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

HediffDef.label: Simple Speech Implant
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic simple speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic simple speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.

HediffDef.label: Advanced Speech Implant
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic advanced speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.

HediffDef.label: Small Research AI Assistant
HediffDef.description: Small brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Small brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.

HediffDef.label: Medium Research AI Assistant
HediffDef.description: Medium brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Medium brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to to boost research speed.

HediffDef.label: Big Research AI Assistant
HediffDef.description: Big brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Big brain implant from "Blossom Co.", to boost research speed.

HediffDef.label: Fixed leg prosthesis
HediffDef.description: Heavy fixed prosthesis replacing the leg.
HediffDef.labelNoun: this limb can hardly be called comfortable.

HediffDef.label: metal joints for legs
HediffDef.description: Lightweight prosthesis with flexion functions.
HediffDef.labelNoun: movable joints increase mobility.

HediffDef.label: prosthesis leg with metal plates
HediffDef.description: Plates add extra weight to the structure while increasing strength.
HediffDef.labelNoun: plates on the surface of the prosthesis provide shape retention.

HediffDef.label: prosthesis leg with simple mechanical sensors
HediffDef.description: Sensors allow the wearer to adapt to the surface.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sensors on the surface of the prosthesis increase adaptation.

HediffDef.label: prosthesis leg with sensors
HediffDef.description: Advanced sensors accelerate owner adaptation.
HediffDef.labelNoun: advanced sensors accelerate owner adaptation.

HediffDef.label: shock absorbing joints
HediffDef.description: Allow you to increase the overall speed of the owner but still can not compete with natural legs.
HediffDef.labelNoun: allow you to increase the overall speed of the owner but still can not compete with natural legs.

HediffDef.label: mobile prosthesis with initial sensitivity
HediffDef.description: The combination of technology has brought prosthetics closer to a new level.
HediffDef.labelNoun: the combination of technology has brought prosthetics closer to a new level.

HediffDef.label: Active hydraulic foot prosthesis
HediffDef.description: Sufficiently strong prosthesis provides high mobility.
HediffDef.labelNoun: sufficiently strong prosthesis provides high mobility.

HediffDef.label: Hydraulic foot prosthesis with sensors
HediffDef.description: Additional weight gain due to various sensors gave the prosthesis an average sensitivity.
HediffDef.labelNoun: additional weight gain due to various sensors gave the prosthesis an average sensitivity.

HediffDef.label: Sports mechanical prosthesis
HediffDef.description: Professional athletes turn to this prosthesis after limb loss.
HediffDef.labelNoun: professional athletes turn to this prosthesis after limb loss.

HediffDef.label: Sports prosthesis S1
HediffDef.description: Updated hip prosthesis system for greater comfort and maximum safety while walking.
HediffDef.labelNoun: updated hip prosthesis system for greater comfort and maximum safety while walking.

HediffDef.label: Sports prosthesis S2
HediffDef.description: Advanced prosthesis S1 increased its mobility.
HediffDef.labelNoun: advanced prosthesis S1 increased its mobility.

HediffDef.label: Knee joint
HediffDef.description: Knee joint with manual locking and hydraulic squat support for balanced and stable movements.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Knee joint with manual locking and hydraulic squat support for balanced and stable movements.

HediffDef.label: Foot Meridium
HediffDef.description: Foot Meridium an electronically controlled artificial foot, almost completely simulating the anatomical shape of the human foot.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Foot Meridium an electronically controlled artificial foot, almost completely simulating the anatomical shape of the human foot.

HediffDef.label: MK1 cybernetic leg prosthesis
HediffDef.description: First version of cybernetic prostheses for the MK1 suit.
HediffDef.labelNoun: First version of cybernetic prostheses for the MK1 suit.

HediffDef.label: MK1 cybernetic advanced leg prosthesis
HediffDef.description: The second version of the cyber prosthesis from MK1.
HediffDef.labelNoun: The second version of the cyber prosthesis from MK1.

HediffDef.label: MK1 final cybernetic leg prosthesis
HediffDef.description: Latest version of the prosthetic leg from MK1.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Latest version of the prosthetic leg from MK1.

HediffDef.label: Simple heart pump
HediffDef.description: Temporary heart substitute.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Prosthesis designed to allow the host to live.

HediffDef.label: Improved heart pump
HediffDef.description: Acceleration of rhythmic movements alleviated the negative effects of heart loss.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Acceleration of rhythmic movements alleviated the negative effects of heart loss.

HediffDef.label: Prosthesis for the heart
HediffDef.description: The first prosthesis for the heart, created on a large scale.
HediffDef.labelNoun: The first prosthesis for the heart, created on a large scale.

HediffDef.label: Advanced prosthesis M2
HediffDef.description: The second prosthesis M2 combines technology from different eras, while at the same time cheap to manufacture.
HediffDef.labelNoun: The second prosthesis M2 combines technology from different eras, while at the same time cheap to manufacture.

HediffDef.label: Serial heart prosthesis M3
HediffDef.description: The latest version of the prosthesis increases human capabilities by several percent.
HediffDef.labelNoun: The latest version of the prosthesis increases human capabilities by several percent.

HediffDef.label: Sports pacemaker S1
HediffDef.description: It has simple metabolic acceleration systems.
HediffDef.labelNoun: It has simple metabolic acceleration systems.

HediffDef.label: Biochemistry pacemaker S2
HediffDef.description: It significantly surpasses its counterpart by accelerating life systems.
HediffDef.labelNoun: It significantly surpasses its counterpart by accelerating life systems.

HediffDef.label: Rhythmic Cardioprosthesis MK1
HediffDef.description: The first MK1 line prosthesis designed to enhance combat quality owners.
HediffDef.labelNoun: The first MK1 line prosthesis designed to enhance combat quality owners.

HediffDef.label: Final pacemaker MK1
HediffDef.description: The perfect denture in the MK1 range.
HediffDef.labelNoun: The perfect denture in the MK1 range.

HediffDef.label: Simple сatheter
HediffDef.description: A catheter that partially simulates the functioning of the kidney.
HediffDef.labelNoun: A catheter that partially simulates the functioning of the kidney.

HediffDef.label: Improved kidney catheter
HediffDef.description: Advanced kidney replacement catheter.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Advanced kidney replacement catheter.

HediffDef.label: Artificial kidney
HediffDef.description: First artificial kidney.
HediffDef.labelNoun: First artificial kidney.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic kidney
HediffDef.description: First artificial kidney.
HediffDef.labelNoun: First artificial kidney.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic body filtration system
HediffDef.description: Biochemical filtration system.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Biochemical filtration system.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic filtration system MK1
HediffDef.description: The first MK1 body filtration system.
HediffDef.labelNoun: The first MK1 body filtration system.

HediffDef.label: Advanced MK1 Filtration System
HediffDef.description: Better biofilter system MK1.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Better biofilter system MK1.

HediffDef.label: NanoBots: Basic Version
HediffDef.description: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. This version has basic functionality, but has less characteristics than advanced versions and gives immunity to only a small set of diseases.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. This version has basic functionality, but has less characteristics than advanced versions and gives immunity to only a small set of diseases.

HediffDef.label: Nanobots: Standard Version
HediffDef.description: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The standard version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to a larger set of dangerous diseases.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The standard version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to a larger set of dangerous diseases.

HediffDef.label: NanoBots: Advanced Version
HediffDef.description: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The advanced version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to the entire set of dangerous diseases.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The advanced version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to the entire set of dangerous diseases.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic lung
HediffDef.description: Synthetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with improved parameters.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Synthetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with improved parameters.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic lung
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with better parameters than a synthetic lung and has a long lifespan.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with better parameters than a synthetic lung and has a long lifespan.

HediffDef.label: Bionic lung
HediffDef.description: Bionic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung and is the most advanced option among similar prosthetics, as it easily adapts to the body, does not cause sepsis and has a number of improved parameters.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Bionic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung and is the most advanced option among similar prosthetics, as it easily adapts to the body, does not cause sepsis and has a number of improved parameters.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Bushido"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of a mechanism, melee abilities significantly increase however the level of ownership of small arms noticeably falls.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of a mechanism, melee abilities significantly increase however the level of ownership of small arms noticeably falls.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Sniper"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, accuracy in ranged combat is essential rises, however, the level of melee falls markedly.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of a mechanism, melee abilities significantly increase however the level of ownership of small arms noticeably falls.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Psychology"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, the ability to conduct dialogue significantly increases, which negatively affects the speed of work.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, the ability to conduct dialogue significantly increases, which negatively affects the speed of work.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Wild"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, the ability to pacify animals increases significantly, which negatively affects field work.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, the ability to pacify animals increases significantly, which negatively affects field work.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Green Fields"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, you remember faster life cycle of plants, merging with the nature of the planet, ceasing to reverse attention to the people around you.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, you remember faster life cycle of plants, merging with the nature of the planet, ceasing to reverse attention to the people around you.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Paladin"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your abilities in medicine grow at an unprecedented speed, but you understand that you do not want to harm people.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your abilities in medicine grow at an unprecedented speed, but you understand that you do not want to harm people.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Mining ways"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of a mechanism, your brain is filled with knowledge about the properties of rocks, and the ability to exploration is essentially are rising.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of a mechanism, your brain is filled with knowledge about the properties of rocks, and the ability to exploration is essentially are rising.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Connoisseur of beauty"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your worldview changes. It seems that you are beginning to see the beautiful in what you considered insignificant.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your worldview changes. It seems that you are beginning to see the beautiful in what you considered insignificant.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Hephaestus"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, fine motor skills increase, and knowledge of working with materials fills your mind.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, fine motor skills increase, and knowledge of working with materials fills your mind.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Science"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your critical knowledge the world crowds out other thoughts, surrendering to work.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your critical knowledge the world crowds out other thoughts, surrendering to work.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Construction"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, fine motor skills increase, and knowledge of working with materials fills your mind.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the action of the mechanism, you can easily recognize errors in the drawings and create new, magnificent structures.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Gourmet"
HediffDef.description: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your critical knowledge the world crowds out other thoughts, surrendering to work.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sophisticated foreign design, once part of an advanced neural networks. Apparently, it has some functionality that affects brain functions. Under the influence of the mechanism, your taste buds aggravated by commensurate newfound culinary abilities.

HediffDef.label: Singular network "Sacred and wild"
HediffDef.description: SA large foreign structure created from twelve fragments. Significantly changes the consciousness of people falling within the radius of impact. It has partial functionality of all parts involved in the creation mechanism.
HediffDef.labelNoun: A large foreign structure created from twelve fragments. Significantly changes the consciousness of people falling within the radius of impact. It has partial functionality of all parts involved in the creation mechanism.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Berserker"
HediffDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of a mechanism your athletic and fighting qualities increase significantly, which negatively affects the speed of everyday work.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of a mechanism your athletic and fighting qualities increase significantly, which negatively affects the speed of everyday work.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Meditation"
HediffDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of a mechanism you better understand animals and people, spending free time on meditation and ordering of one’s own thoughts, which affects health.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of a mechanism you better understand animals and people, spending free time on meditation and ordering of one’s own thoughts, which affects health.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Life force"
HediffDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of the mechanism, you Feel how peaceful and philanthropic fills you, and knowledge of plants becomes part of consciousness.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of the mechanism, you Feel how peaceful and philanthropic fills you, and knowledge of plants becomes part of consciousness.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Consummation"
HediffDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of the mechanism, you feel how the world view is changing. The desire to make peace around you ideal and comfortable for life overshadows the mind.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Under the influence of the mechanism, you feel how the world view is changing. The desire to make peace around you ideal and comfortable for life overshadows the mind.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Yin and Yang"
HediffDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Entropy and Creation harmoniously combined in the design, giving consciousness new properties.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Entropy and Creation harmoniously combined in the design, giving consciousness new properties.

HediffDef.label: Fragment of the neural network "Mental focus"
HediffDef.description: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Lets focus all the efforts of the body to acquire new knowledge and improving intelligence that spends the last body energy reserves.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Combined foreign design, which, Apparently, she was able to combine the advantages two fragments of a neural network at once. Lets focus all the efforts of the body to acquire new knowledge and improving intelligence that spends the last body energy reserves.

HediffDef.label: Light psychoactive emitter
HediffDef.description: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.
HediffDef.labelNoun: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.

HediffDef.label: Medium psychoactive emitter
HediffDef.description: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.

HediffDef.label: Heavy psychoactive emitter
HediffDef.description: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.
HediffDef.labelNoun: A mechanism that affects emotional consciousness, inhibiting feelings for the sake of productivity.

HediffDef.label: Adrenaline ribs
HediffDef.description: Many injectors located on artificial ribs produce adrenaline, accelerating the reaction.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Many injectors located on artificial ribs produce adrenaline, accelerating the reaction.

HediffDef.label: Titanium ribs
HediffDef.description: Strong chest formed from titanium coated ribs.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Strong chest formed from titanium coated ribs.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic ribs
HediffDef.description: Chest consists of complex artificial ribs.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Chest consists of complex artificial ribs.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic breast frame
HediffDef.description: Cybernetic pairs of ribs composed in the form of a strong frame.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic pairs of ribs composed in the form of a strong frame.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic stomach
HediffDef.description: Advanced artificial organ composed of inorganic materials.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Advanced artificial organ composed of inorganic materials.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic stomach MK1
HediffDef.description: MK1 advanced cybernetic prosthesis accelerating carrier metabolism.
HediffDef.labelNoun: MK1 advanced cybernetic prosthesis accelerating carrier metabolism.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic stomach MK1 Light
HediffDef.description: Lightweight cybernetic prosthesis that speeds up metabolism.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Lightweight cybernetic prosthesis that speeds up metabolism.

HediffDef.label: Modular array of liver
HediffDef.description: Microscopic copies of robotic organisms form an organic liver.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Microscopic copies of robotic organisms form an organic liver.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic liver MK1
HediffDef.description: An array of artificial mechanisms that mimic the liver.
HediffDef.labelNoun: An array of artificial mechanisms that mimic the liver.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic liver MK1
HediffDef.description: Large robotic structure imitating the functioning of the natural liver.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Large robotic structure imitating the functioning of the natural liver.

HediffDef.label: Cochlear receiver
HediffDef.description: Small radio transmits sound vibrations to the brain.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Small radio transmits sound vibrations to the brain.

HediffDef.label: Sound wave generator
HediffDef.description: Advanced electromagnetic generator of sound waves transmitted to the brain.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Advanced electromagnetic generator of sound waves transmitted to the brain.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic ear MK1
HediffDef.description: Advanced cybernetic sound wave transducer.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Advanced cybernetic sound wave transducer.

HediffDef.label: Destabilized Neural Network "Unlimited Sin"
HediffDef.description: Charged and unstable alien structure, repeatedly increasing human potential. It consists of many fragments, creating an intricate pattern that shimmers in the dark.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Charged and unstable alien structure, repeatedly increasing human potential. It consists of many fragments, creating an intricate pattern that shimmers in the dark.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Adrenaline shock"
HediffDef.description: A mobile and strong spine redistributes the load and helps the wearer move.
HediffDef.labelNoun: A mobile and strong spine redistributes the load and helps the wearer move.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Colossus"
HediffDef.description: Reinforced cybernetic spine made of titanium alloy and manganese.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Reinforced cybernetic spine made of titanium alloy and manganese.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Screaming Eagles"
HediffDef.description: Durable and lightweight polymetallic exoskeleton.
HediffDef.labelNoun: Durable and lightweight polymetallic exoskeleton.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic exoskeleton "Determitanion"
HediffDef.description: A cybernetic exoskeleton filled with many supporting systems. The Computerium programmed for self-healing also instills a sense of security.
HediffDef.labelNoun: A cybernetic exoskeleton filled with many supporting systems. The Computerium programmed for self-healing also instills a sense of security.
